name: company_assigment
description: Preface: Build a RESTful API that can /create/read/update/delete Product and Category data from a persistence database. ## Models:- ## Product Model: { productId : xxx,		// Product ID productName : xxx,		// Product Name qtyPerUnit : xxx,		// Quantity of the Product unitPrice : xxx,			// Unit Price of the Product unitInStock : xxx,		// Unit in Stock discontinued :  xxx,		// Boolean (yes/no) categoryId : xxx,		// Category ID } ## Category Model: { categoryId : xxx,		// Category ID categoryName : xxx,		// Category Name }
